title: Advancing unsupervised anomaly detection with normalizing flow and multi-scale ensemble learning
details: M Campos-Romero, M Carranza-García, JC Riquelme - Engineering Applications of …, 2024
abstract: Visual anomaly detection plays a crucial role in manufacturing to ensure product quality by identifying image patterns that deviate from the expected ones. Existing methods that rely on distribution estimation struggle with the complexity of real-world …
